#About Me

Hi all,
My name is Balasankar C. I am pursuing my B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at Adi Shankara Institute of Engineering and Technology.

I am interested in programming and have been familiarised with C, C++, Python, Java, C#, VB, VB.NET, ASP.NET, Unix Shell Scripting and jQuery.
